1000.name: ctlK8sClient
1000.long_description: Check whether `mesheryctl` can initialize a Kubernetes client.
1000.probable_cause: Missing certificate data in user's kubeconfic for one or more contexts.
1000.suggested_remediation: Run `mesheryctl system config` to export your Kubernetes' cluster certificate data.

1001.name: ctlK8sConnect
1001.long_description: `mesheryctl` fails to query for pods in the default namespace of the user's current Kubernetes context.
1001.probable_cause: Kuberentes cluster not running or not network unreachable.
1001.suggested_remediation: Verify network connectivity between `mesheryctl` network and Kubernetes cluster defined as current-context in your kubeconfig.
